"I... lost? That I may lose...":
"How wonderful! For so long I've believed this
body to stand at the apex of human potential...
But it seems that I, too, have further yet to grow."

"How arrogant of me--immature of me!
But this is what grants interest to life,
is it not?"

"Thank you dearly, <%me>.
Through this confrontation,
you have taught me my faults."

"Knowing that I may yet become stronger brings
me such joy. Thank you for teaching me that there
are still further heights to reach."

"I will never forget our fight today.
Never, in the long life that I will yet live."

"The frustration of defeat is part of being
human, isn't it? Next time, I will not lose to you."
